<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 20"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Impossible Technique](/Feats.aspx?ID=489) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Fortune" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=76" />
<trait label="Monk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=112" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 165 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Trigger**
An enemy’s attack hits you or you fail a saving throw against an enemy’s ability.

**Requirements**
You are not armored or fatigued.

</column>

---

You execute a maneuver that defies possibility. If the triggering effect was an enemy’s attack hitting you, the enemy rerolls the attack roll and uses the lower result. If the triggering effect was you failing a saving throw, you reroll the saving throw and use the higher result.
name: Impossible Technique
requirement: You are not armored or fatigued.
requirement_markdown: You are not armored or fatigued.
